component.name: OceanPop
component.summary: A relaxing match 3 puzzle game with a twist

description.p: Dive into the relaxing world of OceanPop and experience waves of match-3 gameplay with the three modes available!
Do not get crushed by the tides before completing the 35 levels in regular mode, feel the rush of the currents in challenge mode or just go with the flow of the ocean breeze in relaxed mode!
Challenge mode levels are now random, making each playthrough different
Matches required in challenge mode now only increases every 5 levels
Matches required in challenge mode now maxes out at 25
Fix the high score screen not showing correctly if standard mode had been completed
Show how the game works on first run
Add support for the Wii thanks to mardy on GitHub
Add Dutch translation. Contributions to add additional languages are welcome
Always use maximum resolution in full screen mode
Make window resizable and scale dynamically in windowed mode
Allow opening the menu with middle click on the mouse
Add opening animation to levels
Improve matching animation
Add credits screen
Move game modes into own screen
Fix Playstation Portable version
Improve performance in Playstation Portable version
Improve text positioning on all menus
Decrease the size of binary on all platforms
Log exceptions thanks to mardy on GitHub
Add a short explanation for each mode to the main menu
Overlapping score indicators are now added together
Linux AppImage should now work on more systems
Preparations for a Flathub release
First Release
